name: The Golem Hand Game - Student Project
name_original: The Golem Hand Game - Student Project
description:
Golem's Hand is a platform 2D pixelart "hopsačka", where the player has the task of using the golem's hand itself to find his remaining torn fingers and, thanks to his abilities, his whole body and defeat the sorcerer and recharge the whole of Prague. But golem's hands complicate the journey, both the sorcerer's obedient henchmen and the sorcerer's castle itself, full of traps, puzzles and lava.

A classic 2D action platformer with pixelart graphics with a good portion of hardcore gameplay and nostalgia for it.The player takes on the role of the Hand of the Golem and his task is always to get to the end of the level (to the hole leading to the next level). His path is crossed by enemies, who can throw him back to the last checkpoint (into lava, traps) or kill him outright. The player overcomes various abysses and traps from the sorcerer with only one life, after his loss he returns to the last checkpoint.

THIS VERSION OF GAME IS FIRST LEVEL OF GAME - STUDENT PROJECT.
